name: Koane (Nocta Studio)
description:
Koane is a 2D platformer full of mystery and heartbreaking stories.

You play as Koane who is trying to overcome depression by facing each problem and remembering what was good in all of the bad memories. In this short Metroidvania, you will face a variety of obstacles, learn different abilities and fight strange creatures in order to find all pieces of memory and escape the trance Koane is stuck in.
